TopicTitle: QuickSave - no visual confirmation ("game saved") on screen only quiet "beep"

Articles.Content: Quicksaving (F5 by default) does not show any visual confirmation (like a disappearing text "Game saved successfuly") - only a tiny audial "beep" - what if someone plays game with sound OFF? It is a de-facto standard to display some kind of visual confirmation after a user issues a command in UI-design... this needs to be fixed
